examples: the amount he had in cash was insufficient

definitions.text: a quantity obtained by the addition of a group of numbers

examples: the sum of all our troubles did not equal the misery they suffered

definitions.text: the choicest or most essential or most vital part of some idea or experience
examples: the gist of the prosecutor's argument
the heart and soul of the Republican Party

definitions.text: a set containing all and only the members of two or more given sets
examples: let C be the union of the sets A and B
The abstract summarizes the main ideas in the paper
Add all the people in this town to those of the neighboring town
